name: @binarapps/baca-react-native-template
description: Expo template ready to develop mobile apps
author: BinarApps

scripts.build:production:android: yarn prepare:production && eas build --platform android --profile production
scripts.build:production:ios: yarn prepare:production && eas build --platform ios --profile production
scripts.build:production: yarn prepare:production && eas build --platform all --profile production
scripts.build:qa:android: yarn prepare:qa && eas build --platform android --profile qa
scripts.build:qa:ios: yarn prepare:qa && eas build --platform ios --profile qa
scripts.build:qa: yarn prepare:qa && eas build --platform all --profile qa
scripts.build:staging:android: yarn prepare:staging && eas build --platform android --profile staging
scripts.build:staging:ios: yarn prepare:staging && eas build --platform ios --profile staging
scripts.build:staging: yarn prepare:staging && eas build --platform all --profile staging
scripts.deploy:production:android: yarn prepare:production && eas build --platform android --profile production --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:production:ios: yarn prepare:production && eas build --platform ios --profile production --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:production: yarn prepare:production && eas build --platform all --profile production --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:qa:android: yarn prepare:qa && eas build --platform android --profile qa --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:qa:ios: yarn prepare:qa && eas build --platform ios --profile qa --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:qa: yarn prepare:qa && eas build --platform all --profile qa --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:staging:android: yarn prepare:staging && eas build --platform android --profile staging --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:staging:ios: yarn prepare:staging && eas build --platform ios --profile staging --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.deploy:staging: yarn prepare:staging && eas build --platform all --profile staging --auto-submit --non-interactive
scripts.eas-build-pre-install: base64 --help && echo $ANDROID_FIREBASE_CONFIG | base64 --decode > google-services.json  && cat google-services.json && echo $IOS_FIREBASE_CONFIG | base64 --decode > GoogleService-Info.plist && cat GoogleService-Info.plist
scripts.generate:component: node ./scripts/create_new_component.js && yarn eslint src --fix && yarn tsc
scripts.generate:screen: node ./scripts/create_new_screen.js && yarn eslint src --fix && yarn tsc
scripts.prepare:production: yarn && yarn generate:env:production && yarn upload:env && yarn generate:google-services-config
scripts.prepare:qa: yarn && yarn generate:env:qa && yarn upload:env && yarn generate:google-services-config
scripts.prepare:staging: yarn && yarn generate:env:staging && yarn upload:env && yarn generate:google-services-config
scripts.start:prod: yarn generate:env:production && IS_DEV=1 IS_EXPO_GO=1 expo start -c -g
scripts.start:staging: yarn generate:env:staging && IS_DEV=1 IS_EXPO_GO=1 expo start -c -g
scripts.start: yarn generate:env:qa && cross-env IS_DEV=1 IS_EXPO_GO=1 expo start -c -g
scripts.update:expo_go: yarn prepare:qa && cross-env IS_DEV=1 eas update --auto
scripts.update:production:android: yarn prepare:production &&  eas update --branch production --platform android && yarn generate:last:publish production
scripts.update:production:ios: yarn prepare:production && eas update --branch production --platform ios && yarn generate:last:publish production
scripts.update:production: yarn prepare:production && eas update --branch production --message="ENV: Production" && yarn generate:last:publish production
scripts.update:qa:android: yarn prepare:qa && eas update --branch qa --platform android && yarn generate:last:publish qa
scripts.update:qa:ios: yarn prepare:qa && eas update --branch qa --platform ios && yarn generate:last:publish qa
scripts.update:qa: yarn prepare:qa && eas update --branch qa --message="ENV: QA" && yarn generate:last:publish qa
scripts.update:staging:android: yarn prepare:staging && eas update --branch staging --platform android && yarn generate:last:publish staging
scripts.update:staging:ios: yarn prepare:staging && eas update --branch staging --platform ios && yarn generate:last:publish staging
scripts.update:staging: yarn prepare:staging && eas update --branch staging --message="ENV: Staging" && yarn generate:last:publish staging
